Reviews.Title: Good Item
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: This is a very good item. I used it immediately when it came in the mail. I would recommend this product to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Just right....
Reviews.Author: Rl Shuey
Reviews.Content: These were just the length I needed (would have like to buy 15 ft ones but they are not available), but when I went to buy more they were not available, so I had to buy the 38 ft ones and they are too long. I'm able to use the 38 ft ones, but I've got a lot of excess cable. All in all, considering the quality/price ratio of these items, I'm happy!

ProductInfo.Features:
•Premium quality Pre-made Siamese Cable with both BNC and Power Connectors for Ultimate Performance
•The 75 Ohm video conductor is surrounded by a heavy braided shield that provides maximum protection from stray RF (radio frequency), digital processing and radiated power signals
•Easy connection from a CCTV/Surveillance Camera to a Digital Video Recorder (DVR) and Power Supply
•Simplify installation by using a single cable for both power and video
FREE 2 RCA ADAPTERS WITH EACH CABLE
ProductInfo.Name: Cables Direct Online- BLACK 20ft PREMIUM QUALITY PRE-MADE SECURITY CAMERA VIDEO POWER CABLE RG59 + 18/2
